	new_password       :[M][6] ( New Password )
	confirm_password   :[M]    ( Confirm Password | same as password )

request.description:
# (1) Search ON ('filename','file_path','model_name','error_log','user name','status text','no_of_rows') :

    e.g. {{BASE_URL}}import-csv-log?search=admin

    Where, "search" is key and "test" is a search string

# (2) Sorting ON ('filename','file_path','model_name','error_log','user_id','status','no_of_rows'):

    e.g. {{BASE_URL}}import-csv-log?sort=name&order_by=desc

    Where, "sort" and "order_by" is key and "name" and "desc" is value

# (3) Per Page Filter :

    e.g. {{BASE_URL}}import-csv-log?per_page=3

    Where, "per_page" is key and "3" is value.

# (4) Page Filter :

    e.g. {{BASE_URL}}import-csv-log?page=1

    Where, "page" is key and "1" is value.

request.description:
### Get Activities

    [M]  - Mandatory
    [NM] - Non-Mandatory

    module      : [NM][array] [e.g. "user"]
    user_id     : [NM][array] [Users table ID]
    period_type : [NM][enum] ['0' => Custom, '1' => last 3 months, '2' => last 6 months, '3' => last 12 months, '4' => last 24 months]
    start_time  : [NM] [M] - IF period_type is '0' Custom
    end_time    : [NM] [M] - IF period_type is '0' Custom
